# Fastmeal Contracts

## Logic

### FastMeal(FTL) Tokenomics

```text
Name: FastMeal
Symbol: $FTL
Decimals: 6
Total Supply: 1.5 billion $FTL tokens
Presale: 30% (450 million $FTL)
Giveaway/Airdrop: 5% (75 million $FTL)
Team: 10% (150 million $FTL)
Uniswap Liquidity: 7% (105 million $FTL)
Treasury: 15% (225 million $FTL)
Advisor: 3% (45 million $FTL)
Reward Pool: 10% (150 million $FTL)
Work-to-Earn: 20% (300 million $FTL)
```

### Presale Logic

```text
Presale Strategy
FastMeal Token Presale
Name: FastMeal
Symbol: $FTL
Decimals: 6
Total Supply: 1.5 billion $FTL tokens
Presale: 30% (450 million $FTL)
     Phase 1:
     - Allocation: 5% of Private and Presale (22,500,000 $FTL)
     - Price per Token: $0.01 per $FTL
     - Total Funds Raised in Phase 1: $225,000
```

## Testnet Addresses

```text
Deployer: 0x2faf8ab2b9ac8Bd4176A0B9D31502bA3a59B4b41
```

### FastMeal Addresses

```text
Goerli
    _NAME: FastMeal
    _SYMBOL: $FTL
    _LZENDPOINT: 0xbfD2135BFfbb0B5378b56643c2Df8a87552Bfa23
    Parameters: 

    FastMeal: 0xc466d5fC8dc03180ac50530606e04EAd16D309b5

        setTrustedRemoteAddress
            _remoteChainId: 10102
            _remoteAddress: 0x133B5f42Fc86897acFDBC62b747977F2C69d7aC2

BSC Testnet
    _NAME: FastMeal
    _SYMBOL: $FTL
    _LZENDPOINT: 0x6Fcb97553D41516Cb228ac03FdC8B9a0a9df04A1
    Parameters: 

    FastMeal: 0x133B5f42Fc86897acFDBC62b747977F2C69d7aC2

        setTrustedRemoteAddress
            _remoteChainId: 10121
            _remoteAddress: 0xc466d5fC8dc03180ac50530606e04EAd16D309b5
```

Goerli
    Tether USD
    USDT
    6
        _initialSupply (uint256): 100000000000

### Presale Addresses

```text
Implement- Presale

ProxyAdmin

TransparentUpgradeableProxy(Proxy)
```
